reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it hits above the knee, and appreciate its high-end appearance that makes them feel sexy. Moreover, the dress is comfortable and flattering, complimenting all curves, and one customer mentions it's not itchy at all. However, the material quality and color receive mixed feedback - while some find the fabric amazing and classy, others say it's cheap, and while some love the color, others say it's not as expected. Additionally, opinions about sizing are divided, with some finding it perfect while others say it runs large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So basic, but it looks and feels so good!
items.body: This dress is so basic, but it looks and feels so good! I love the purple color. This dress stretches so much and will hug your body for a proper fit from the front to the back. I think the long sleeves on this dress look great and make the color stand out more. It falls to just above your knees. When I wear this dress with my favorite pair of silky and shiny nude or tan pantyhose and high heels, it makes me feel so feminine and sexy. I feel so wonderful in this dress, that it's a pleasure to wear it all day long. Read more
items.author: Lenny S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: This dress was great and it fit perfectly Read more
items.author: Salena Terrell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, but a little bunchy at the waist
items.body: It fits well and washes up just fine. I didn't notice any shrinking or anything. As most others have pointed out, it seems like a maternity dress. There is a LOT of extra material at the waist, so the bunching is kind of weird. It is really cute with a flannel tied around your waist, if you're into the 90s look (and I totally am). I bought four different colors, thinking I would return a couple, but I really like them and kept them all. The lighter colors are less forgiving, but that is to be expected. Over all, a good buy. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fabric.
items.body: The dress fits true to size and is very flattering on curvy women. Fabric is a nice flat color with supportive stretch. Not a body shaper but light control. I did not like the white color as much as the other colors. Sleeves are a bit long as is the dress. Read more
items.author: Lt

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Smells bad
items.body: The black dress smells really bad like chemicals from dye or something? It is not 100% cotton, but instead a blend of cotton and elastane. Also the arms are too tight. I’m built like a stick figure so that’s really saying something coming from me. I had to return it. Read more
items.author: We're all worth it!

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size up from normal.
items.body: 5ft 7 in. 128lbs. Got a Large as I didn't trust that a MED would fit. The large fits well and not too tight. I anticipate this will shrink a little once washed based on previous like-item purchases. If it does it will be a little less slack but still comfortable. Got black. Lighter colors may be a little see-through. Read more
items.author: Sandra Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs large and not meant for petite women
items.body: The dress was very pretty but it was too big and too long for me Read more
items.author: sal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great
items.body: Love this dress fits good on me and I love the length Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Army Green, Classic Black, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Soft White, Dark Green, Rose Red, Off-white, Purple, Yellow, Red-01. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
